item.trans: n. 撤退；休息寓所；撤退 vi. 撤退；退避；向后倾 vt. 退（棋）；使后退 同义词:withdrawal, pullback, withdraw, bug out The enemy was forced to retreat from the city.敌人被迫撤出这个城市。
adj. 宪法的；本质的；体质上的；保健的 n. 保健散步；保健运动 同义词:essential, intrinsic, interior Congress has no constitutional power to remove the president .但宪法并未规定议会有权撤销总统。
n. 斜坡；倾斜；斜率；扛枪姿势 vi. 倾斜；逃走 vt. 倾斜；使倾斜；扛 同义词:hill, pitch, pitch, tip up, carry, tip up to slope to the east向东倾斜
art. 一；任一；每一 row A in a cinema电影院第一排座位

n. 精制；文雅；[化工][油气][冶] 提纯 同义词:cultivation, purification Bill Venners : You say , "Don't spoil a perfectly good program by over- embellishment and over- refinement . " How do I know when to stop ?比尔·凡纳斯：你们说：“过度修饰或者过度精炼会毁掉一个足够好的软件。”我怎么才能知道何时该停止？
vi. 浮现；摆脱；暴露 同义词:ray, cast off The sun emerges from behind the clouds.太阳从云层里露出。
art. 一；任一；每一 row A in a cinema电影院第一排座位
n. 珊瑚（coral的复数） Those sour seas slow the growth of corals .酸性海域会阻碍珊瑚的生长繁殖。
adj. 中间的，中等的；半生熟的 n. 方法；媒体；媒介；中间物 同义词:mid, intermediary, middle, secondary, moderate, method, approach, way, system, how A medium coffee of the day , please .请给我一杯中杯的本日咖啡。
vt. 限制；在…周围画线 同义词:block, set a limit to Please circumscribe the words which are wrongly spelled.请将拼错的词圈出来。
adj. 脊髓的；脊柱的；针的；脊骨的；尖刺的 n. 脊椎麻醉 同义词:rachial, medullary They report finding a gene that sends the itch signal up the spinal cord to the brain .他们研究发现了有一种基因是传送瘙痒信号通过脊髓到脑部的。
vt. 倾倒；倾卸 vi. 倒垃圾 n. 垃圾场 同义词:pour in, empty the trash Dump the topsoil here.把表土倒在这里。
adj. 易受攻击的，易受…的攻击；易受伤害的；有弱点的 同义词:sensitive, assailable But modern humans were more vulnerable to the cold .但是现代人更容易受到寒冷的攻击。
n. 制定，颁布；通过；法令 同义词:establishment, act The two most dramatic amendments have little chance of enactment .另外两项修正案最惹人注目但不太可能通过。
adj. 连续的；继承的；依次的；接替的 同义词:continuing, straight, endless, running, serial The rule of combination of symmetry operations is successive performance of them .对称操作的组合规则，是逐次地去运用它们。
adv. 照惯例，照常套 Cleaning the panels conventionally uses precious water .常规太阳能板的清洁是使用水。
adj. 决定性的 n. 决定因素；[数] 行列式 同义词:crucial, critical, final, decisive, conclusive, Determinants and Permanents Clearly the size of the market is not the determinant .显然，其市场的大小并不是决定因素。

adj. 明显的；明白的 同义词:obvious, distinct, visible Even on his last day at the White House , when the thinning hair and gaunt face of a cancer patient was so evident , he stressed how he loved his job .即使在他在白宫的最后一天，在一个癌症病人的稀疏的头发和憔悴的脸如此明显的情况下，他仍表达了他是多么的热爱他的工作。
adj. 后来的，随后的 同义词:succeeding, pursuant To this end , the first panel is generally quite short , with subsequent panels gradually increasing in length .这样做的结果是，第一个采区一般很短，接下来的采区一般逐渐增加长度。

adj. 不利的；相反的；敌对的（名词adverseness，副词adversely） 同义词:against, contrary, opposite, counter, cross A second error was that Japan tried to offset the adverse economic effects of a strong yen with over- lax monetary policy .第二个错误是日本试图用过度宽松的货币政策来冲销强势日元带来的负面经济效应。
vi. 下降；下去；下来；遗传；屈尊 vt. 下去；沿…向下 同义词:decline, go down They descended from the mountaintop.他们从山顶下来。
n. 牛（ox的复数） 同义词:cows, neats The farmer yoke the oxen before hitch them to the wagon .农夫在将牛套上大车之前先给它们套上轭。
n. 挽歌；恸哭；悲痛之情 vi. 哀悼；悲叹；悔恨 vt. 哀悼；痛惜 同义词:keen, elegy, grieve over, mourn over, regret, grieve over to lament for the dead哀悼死者
n. 多样性；差异 同义词:difference, multiplicity And now all three tactics — information , diversity and choice —are looking shaky .现在信息、多元化、以及选择、这三种手段看起来不可靠。
adj. 装饰的，装饰性的 n. 观赏植物；装饰品 同义词:decorative, illuminative, decoration, trimming European elm with lustrous smooth leaves ornamental .欧洲榆，有光亮、平滑的叶片，用作观赏植物。
vi. 变硬；变猛烈；变粘 vt. 使变硬；使粘稠 同义词:harden, callus to stiffen a knife by quenching以淬火使刀子变硬
adj. 强烈的；紧张的；非常的；热情的 同义词:burning, stressed, sharp, warm, hot Depression is a medical condition that causes intense feelings of sadness .抑郁症是一种导致强烈悲伤情绪的身体状态。
n. 强心剂；强胃剂 adj. 心脏的；心脏病的；（胃的）喷门 同义词:metrazol, cordis But the size of those cardiac patches has been limited .但是那些心脏修补的大小是受限制的。
n. 土砖，砖坯 But people who work with adobe must experiment .但是从事土坯工作的人必须做试验。
vt. 表明；指出；预示；象征 同义词:forecast, index, image, shadow, figure to indicate the direction by pointing with one's finger用手指指示方向
adj. 难懂的，复杂的 同义词:involved, detailed, sophisticated, elusive You mustn’t complicate the problem by raising new issues.你千万不要提出新的争端使问题更加复杂化。
n. [航] 宇宙飞船，航天器 同义词:aerospacecraft, astrovehicle The design would be part aircraft and part spacecraft .飞机将设计成半飞机半宇宙飞船的式样。
adj. 混凝土的；实在的，具体的；有形的 vi. 凝结 vt. 使凝固；用混凝土修筑 n. 具体物；凝结物 同义词:honest, effective, real, to freeze, clot, coagulation The workmen are still busy concreting the road.工人们仍忙着用混凝土铺路。
adj. 公共的；公社的 communal spirit that encourages people to share food , especially when it is scarce , may start to break down.共产主义思想鼓励人们共享食物，尤其是在食品短缺时，但这次或许没人遵从。
n. 电梯；升降机；升降舵；起卸机 同义词:lift, moving staircase Next I intend to build an elevator to store the corn I 'll harvest .下一步我打算建一个谷物仓库，来贮藏我将收获的玉米。
vi. 繁荣，昌盛；成功 vt. 使……成功；使……昌盛；使……繁荣 同义词:arrive, flower, win, thrive May the gods prosper our city!愿神灵保佑我们的城市繁荣!
adj. 管理的；控制的；调整的 同义词:administrative, managing, guiding This was the regulatory Achilles heel that led to the present crisis .这就是导致当今经济危机的“监管的阿基里斯之踵”。
adj. 水平的；地平线的；同一阶层的 n. 水平线，水平面；水平位置 同义词:level, aclinic, hydrostatic level, horizon line Also notice the unfortunate use of horizontal scrollbars in all list fields .不过，注意所有的列表域遗憾地使用了水平滚动条。
vt. 压倒；淹没；受打击 同义词:flood, flow We overwhelmed the enemy by superior forces.我们以优势兵力打垮了敌军。
adj. 球形的，球面的；天体的 同义词:global, ball-shaped A rubber spherical balloon is quickly blown up in an angry sea by a ditched pilot .一个迫降的飞行员在波涛汹涌的海上向一个橡皮球迅速充气。
vt. 贬低；使……丢脸；使……降级；使……降解 vi. 降级，降低；退化 同义词:lower, bemean, sink in the scale, lower down She felt he was degrading her by making her report to the director.她感到他让她向主管人报告是在侮辱她。
adj. 粘的；粘性的 同义词:glutinous, viscous There are several explanations for why dividends have been sticky in Asia .对于为何亚洲的红利一直具有粘性，存在几个解释。

n. 病房；保卫；监视 vt. 避开；保卫；守护 同义词:observation, safeguard, monitoring, surveillance, watch, avoid, guard, shun More importantly , he went on, his knowledge means that he can now take measures to ward off the disease .随后他解释道，更重要的是，我知道了这些信息之后就可以采取措施预防患病。
n. 定罪；确信；证明有罪 同义词:assurance, damningness This was her third conviction .这是她第三次定罪。
adj. 自发的；自然的；无意识的 同义词:autonomous, mechanical, natural, initiative You can pick up your story the next evening at this spontaneous bookmark .第二天晚上你可以凭借这自然产生的书签继续跟进你的故事。
n. 争论；打架；磨损处 vt. 使磨损；变得令人紧张、急躁 vi. 被磨损 同义词:controversy, combat, fight, scuff frayed cuffs磨破的袖口
n. 排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物 同义词:removal, ruling out But it claims that Intel 's discounts and rebates were often conditional on the exclusion of its rival , AMD .但是它声称英特尔的折扣和返款经常以排除它的竞争对手AMD为条件。
n. 讽刺；讽刺文学，讽刺作品 同义词:hit, sarcasm Satire is often a form of protest against injustice .讽刺往往是一种对不公正的抗议形式。
vt. 组成，构成；建立；任命 同义词:install, establish, form, found, build Four quarts constitute a gallon.四夸脱构成一加仑。
vt. 逃避，躲避 同义词:escape, avoid, get out of to elude capture逃避逮捕
adj. 令人生畏的；严峻的；险恶的 v. 禁止；不准（forbid的ing形式） 同义词:severe, austere, prohibiting to forbid the use of chemical fertilizers禁止使用化肥
n. 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者 同义词:advocate, supporter According to her Web site , she is a proponent of alternative medicine that uses a holistic approach .据她的网站说，她是利用综合疗法以替代药物的支持者。
n. 自负；要求；主张；借口；骄傲 同义词:requirement, opinion, desire, need, excuse pretensioned concrete预应力(或先张法)混凝土[参较 posttension]
n. 教条，教理；武断的意见 同义词:credendum This is a time to put dogma and politics to one side and concentrate on pragmatic answers .因此现在必须将教条和政治放在一边，全力关注使用的解决方案。
adj. 世俗的，平凡的；世界的，宇宙的 同义词:ordinary, lay, universal, international, stock Increasing the grid 's IQ would bring more mundane benefits , too.提高电网的“智商”也会带来更多的现实利益。
adv. 伦理上 The impulse to invest ethically is praiseworthy , but I'm skeptical of " one size fits all " approaches to it.促进合乎道义的投资是值得赞赏的，但我怀疑这种“一刀切”的做法能否行得通。
vt. 支配，主宰；在…中占优势 vi. 占主导（或支配）地位；占优势 同义词:rule, hold sway, advantage over, prevail over The views of the left wing have tended to predominate within the party.左翼的观点趋向于在该党党内占支配地位。
n. 首字母缩略词 同义词:initialism The committee's name has been acronymed NACA.该委员会的名称被缩合成NACA。
vt. 维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实 同义词:maintain, undertake, support, accept, favor to sustain the main beam支撑主梁的重量
adj. 外部的；表面的；[药] 外用的；外国的；外面的 n. 外部；外观；外面 同义词:foreign, outer, outside, surface, out, outside, without, surface, face, garment Why should it depend for recovery on external demand ?其经济复苏为何要依赖于外部需求呢？
n. 破坏；失事；残骸；失去健康的人 vt. 破坏；使失事；拆毁 vi. 失事；营救失事船只 同义词:destruction, breaking, blasting, remain, disruption, destroy, undermine, founder My car was completely wrecked in the accident.我的车在这次车祸中彻底毁了。
n. 群；簇；丛；串 vi. 群聚；丛生 vt. 使聚集；聚集在某人的周围 同义词:gang, bunch, qun, bush, converge The students clustered their tents together.学生们把帐篷集中搭在一起。
adj. 危险的；不确定的 同义词:dangerous, critical, risky, threatening Many of the sources of today 's growth are temporary and precarious .当前的经济增长只是暂时的，而且极不稳定。
n. 格式；版式；开本 vt. 使格式化；规定…的格式 vi. 设计版式 Choose this format to clear all table formatting .选用此格式可清除所有的表格格式。
vt. 消除；排除 同义词:avoid, exclude to eliminate hunger消灭饥饿现象
adj. 多重的；多样的；许多的 n. 倍数；[电] 并联 同义词:numerous, many, hundred, time, paralleling With multiple animals , that 's a very large effect . It cuts the risk almost in half .如果动物种类多，那么效果会很明显，几乎会降低将近一半的风险。
adj. 多层面的 Of late , the company has exhibited a multifaceted obsession with online geo location .最近，该公司已表现出多方面的迷恋网上地理位置。
n. 联号；隶属的机构等 vt. 使附属；接纳；使紧密联系 vi. 参加，加入；发生联系 同义词:associated company, receive, take on sb, participate in, take part in, go through to affiliate oneself to (或 with) a party加入某政党
n. 山脊；山脉；屋脊 vt. 使成脊状；作垄 vi. 成脊状 同义词:mountain range, cordillera to ridge the land垦地作垄
adj. 离散的，不连续的 n. 分立元件；独立部件 同义词:uncontinuous, incontinuous How about time that comes in discrete steps , as for computers , instead of being continuous ?或者时间并不连续，而是一步步离散分立的，就像电脑一样？
conj. 因为；随着；虽然；依照；当…时 prep. 如同；当作；以…的身份 adv. 同样地；和…一样的 同义词:because, although, since, for, seeing, in the light of, like, equally, similarly, same, likewise It flew straight as an arrow.它直飞如箭。
n. 大厦；宅邸 同义词:palace, edifice He wants to live honourably in Pakistan , in a mansion he is building outside Islamabad .穆沙拉夫希望体面的留在巴基斯坦，住在他建在伊斯兰堡城外的公馆。
n. 派别；内讧；小集团；纪实小说 同义词:wing, junta The progressive faction demanded a reserve system and currency supply owned and controlled by the government .进步派系要求建立由政府占有和控制的储备制度和货币供应。
n. 冷杉；枞木 abbr. 弗京（firkin） 同义词:firtree Poplar , elm , walnut , camphor , fir , rosewood , bamboo , etc .白杨，榆木，胡桃，樟树，枞树，紫檀，竹子等。
adj. 生动的；鲜明的；鲜艳的 同义词:telling, live, bright An old soldier gave us a vivid account of the Long March .一位老战士有声有色地给我们叙述了长征的故事。
adj. 不渗透性的；（对水等）不能渗透的 The landfill sits on a natural foundation of London clay which is more impermeable .垃圾填埋点位于伦敦泥土的自然地基上，这些泥土几乎是不可渗透的。
vi. 受压缩小 vt. 压缩，压紧；精简 同义词:impact, pack Wood cuttings and sawdust can be compressed into boards.木头的碎渣和锯末可以压成木板。
n. 航天飞机；穿梭；梭子；穿梭班机、公共汽车等 vt. 使穿梭般来回移动；短程穿梭般运送 vi. 穿梭往返 同义词:spaceplane to see a snake shuttle its tongue看见一条蛇不停地吐着舌头
n. 观众；旁观者 同义词:audience, onlooker But the crazy thing is that people still do go just to be a spectator at other people 's inability to sing .但是，当你不得不听那些没有唱歌天赋的人不停的唱歌，那真是件令人疯狂的事情。
vt. 治理；套；驾驭；披上甲胄 n. 马具；甲胄；挽具状带子；降落伞背带 同义词:keep on top, saddlery, coat of mail He harnessed his horse to a tree.他把他的马拴在一棵树上。

n. 内地；穷乡僻壤；靠港口供应的内地贸易区 同义词:inland, outback The capital 's citizens , inured to fighting in hinterland , remain shocked by the speed with which the rebels reached them .首都的居民尽管已经习惯于乍得中心地区的战乱，他们仍然对叛军进攻的速度感动惊讶。
vt. 使成熟 vi. 成熟 同义词:age, mellow, age, mature, flower The grapes are ripening, the apple trees are heavy with fruit.葡萄就要熟了，苹果树上结满了果实。

adj. 麻醉的；有麻醉作用的；催眠的 n. [药] 麻醉药；镇静剂；起麻醉作用的事物 同义词:anesthetic, anaesthetic, drug, banque A narcotic alkaloid , C18H21NO4 , related to codeine , used as an analgesic and a sedative chiefly in the form of its hydrochloride salt .欧克西克锭一种麻醉性的生物碱，C18H21NO4，和可待因有关的，用作止育药和镇静药，主要以其盐酸化物盐的形式存在。
vi. 渴望，痛苦；憔悴 n. [林] 松树；凤梨，菠萝 vt. 为…悲哀；哀悼 adj. 松木的；似松的 同义词:rare, aspire, ananas, regret, grieve over Then he scraped away the dirt , and exposed a pine shingle .接着他刨去泥土，下面露出一块松木瓦块。
vt. 使受精；使肥沃 同义词:enrich Nitrates fertilize soil.硝酸盐使土壤变肥沃。
n. 表面；表层；外观 adj. 表面的，肤浅的 vi. 浮出水面 vt. 使浮出水面；使成平面 同义词:face, outside, garment, external, facial, shallow, superficial, Head Above Water, tabulate to surface a road铺路
n. 转让；转移；传递；过户 vi. 转让；转学；换车 vt. 使转移；调任 同义词:negotiation, diversion, make over, dispose of, hand, negotiate They will transfer those books into the new library.他们将把那些书搬进新的图书馆。

adv. 适宜地；适当地 同义词:properly, well, adequately, appropriately, befittingly Ideas and concepts , even paradigms , come to fruition because of their social and historical milieu , as Merton and others have so aptly shown .思想和观念，甚至范式因其社会和历史环境而成熟，正如默顿以及其他人适当表明的一样。
vt. 引起；创作 vi. 发源；发生；起航 同义词:attract, produce, cause, occasion, operate, happen, occur, proceed The film originated from a novel.这部电影源自一部小说。
n. 住宅；家庭；机构；议会；某种用途的建筑物 vt. 覆盖；给…房子住；把…储藏在房内 vi. 住 同义词:residence, organization, machinery, family, home, invest, sheet, roof, cap We should manage to house and feed the poor.我们得设法解决贫民的食宿问题。
vt. 呼气；发出；发散；使蒸发 vi. 呼气；发出；发散 同义词:emit, to send out, to send out, give off to exhale slowly缓慢地呼气
n. 装饰，装潢；装饰品；奖章 同义词:medal, adornment Decoration of the unfinished project is a kind of conceptual incubation .装饰那些未完成的作品是一种概念般的孵化。
n. [农学] 授粉（作用） Flowers are often pollinated by bees.花常常由蜜蜂传授花粉。
vi. 提出要求 vt. 要求；声称；需要；认领 n. 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得 同义词:exact, say, lack, desire, call for, requirement, do, assurance, need, desire Every citizen may claim the protection of the law.每个公民都可以要求受到法律的保护。

adj. 世俗的；长期的；现世的；不朽的 n. 牧师 同义词:chronic, long time, standing, eternal, lay, minister, priest, preacher Indonesia prides itself on being a secular state that happens to have a Muslim majority .印尼人认为，该国是世俗国家，恰巧穆斯林占多数，他们对此感到自豪。

n. 管理人；监护人；保管人 同义词:administrator, supervisor Investors are also worried by measures to increase the liability that custodian banks have for the assets they look after.投资者也同样对此表示担忧，该提案增加了受托管的银行对资产管理的负担。
